Afterlife.DESCRIPTION: You may play cards with #yAfterlife from your #yExhaust pile by #yPurging #b1 random #yNon-Afterlife card from your #yExhaust pile.

Aura.DESCRIPTION: Auras effects are automatically activated when a condition is met. These cards are not added to your draw pile at the start of battle.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play or discard this card, reduce its #yCooldown by #b1. If it is at #b0, activate this effect instead.

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

Phasing.DESCRIPTION: You have a 35% chance to dodge each attack. Reduce this chance by 5% each turn. Stacking this power resets and delays the chance reduction by 1 turn.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Reduce a card's #yRicochet by #b1 for every turn that it is in the Exhaust pile. If it is at #b0 while in your Exhaust pile, move it to your draw pile.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Synergy.DESCRIPTION: A card #ySynergizes if the last card played this turn shares an #yAffinity color, with at least #b1 of the #b2 #yAffinities being #yLV2.

Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: Your #yTeamwork value is equal to the amount of cards in hand with the same #yAffinity color. If not specified, it refers to the color with the highest number of cards.

~Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 orb. NL  NL Gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.
